name: Unknown Signal: Invasion
description:
Unknown Signal: Invasion is a continuation of the exciting sci-fi game. This time you have to go to an unknown planet to investigate a new mysterious signal coming from an unknown source. Fight dangerous creatures and go through difficult situations that await you on an unknown planet! Find out what is hidden behind the mysterious signal and become a real hero!

Peculiarities
- Nice soundtrack
- Colorful graphics.
- Dangerous opponents
